The CEO signed a secret deal using her favorite low-exponent RSA signature. Recover the original contract from this intercepted signature: 0x3d494617c462a1727a5e8731e9d01510f50e2bbe350c5c705a3a567dd9886c85a895e760cf8e0c303ed05bcdfb87717bc388cc3c36fdf55a33e5ced9c8e39964

Public Key (n, e): (4689186281143958604900698003340277209776852170418195566800193138595893205428003775154126696078467146942010728760921918670266090664362763432273534947438947, 3)

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{rmo7l64t}
ciphertext: 0x3d494617c462a1727a5e8731e9d01510f50e2bbe350c5c705a3a567dd9886c85a895e760cf8e0c303ed05bcdfb87717bc388cc3c36fdf55a33e5ced9c8e39964
cipher: RSA Low-Exponent Signature
hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
necessary_info: Public Key (n, e): (4689186281143958604900698003340277209776852170418195566800193138595893205428003775154126696078467146942010728760921918670266090664362763432273534947438947, 3)
subtype: rsa_sign_with_low_public_exponent
archetype: signature_schemes
